channel.title: Divergentx (The old Days of ss are back)
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://forum.divergentx.com/images/bluefox/misc/Divergentx.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=3][COLOR=#ff0000][U]NOTE[/U][/COLOR]: [/SIZE][COLOR=#000000][SIZE=3]This is a server evolved around bringing back memories of Old Spawnscape! Please Continue to read on to find out more or scroll to the Notice (End Of Thread) [/SIZE] [/COLOR][/B] [COLOR=#000000][CENTER]Divergentx is based around the Spawnscape OLD Source, Not to old. For those who enjoyed the good old days of spawnscape. Also those who wish to play a 614 Spawn/Eco Server.
A basic run down of what the server has (If you don't know, This will be short & an non-complex).
- Fully Functional Player Vs Player system with Drop rewards in safe zones. - Multiple PVP zones, Safe, Unsafe and Multi. - Old Locations (Magebank, Thieving Pyramid) - Donatorzone (Few features added) - Player Killing Points Shop - Few New Weapons Functioning (Gmaul, Dmace, etc) - Player Interface (Displays Kdr, Voting Points, Players online etc)
[b]New Extra's In Server[/b] - Custom Chest To Obtain random items - Open by obtaining a key
[b]Currently being Added[/b] - Clan Chat - Voting Shop
[b]The server currently has:[/b] - Auto-Voting (Fully Functional & Incentive Postback) Auto-Donation (Same Items) - Forum's Professionally Made - Homepage (Professionally Made) - Auto-cache downloading Client - Fully working Webclient
Divergentx will not have any other major changes unless the community (Majority) votes on a specific thing to add into the server. If the server's community would like an extra mini-game, Then it will be added solely for player interaction and entertainment.
[size=14pt][u][b]Picture's of locations and More[/b][/u][/size]
[COLOR=#000000]Original Home Location (Removed Npc's & Objects)[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dbapWD5.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=#000000]Fully Functional Auto-Voting System[/COLOR] (with original voting rewards) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3mp5Tz9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5p1eFOu.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=#000000]Old Thieving Area[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/133RjPV.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=#000000]Player Killing Points Shop (Original)[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/64EsMG8.png[/img] [COLOR=#000000] [/COLOR] [COLOR=#000000]Mage Bank[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rPjMbZE.png[/img]
[COLOR=#000000]Mage Arena (For Hybrids, Range De-activated in this area)[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jbKa9Lh.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=#000000]Donatorzone (Added Extra Thieving [More Coins])[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yafJMgT.png[/img]
[COLOR=#000000]Extra Feature - Key & Chest Area[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PTQQLqz.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt][font=impact][u]Active Divergentx Links[/u][/font][/size]
[B][COLOR=#000000]Homepage [/COLOR][/B]- [url=http://home.divergentx.com]DivergentX - Innovative RSPS[/url] [B][COLOR=#000000]Forums [/COLOR][/B]- [url=http://forum.divergentx.com]DivergentX Forums[/url] [B][COLOR=#000000]Webclient [/COLOR][/B]- [url=http://play.divergentx.com/play/]Divergentx - Webclient[/url] [COLOR=#000000][B]Download [/B][/COLOR]- [url=http://dl.divergentx.com/Divergentx.jar]http://dl.divergentx.com/Divergentx.jar[/url] [COLOR=#000000][B]Vote [/B][/COLOR]- [url=http://vote.divergentx.com]Divergentx - Voting[/url] [COLOR=#000000][B]Donate[/B][/COLOR] - [url=http://donate.divergentx.com]Divergentx 614 Shop[/url]
[u][b]NOTICE[/b][/u] [b]Please Note, That i do not expect any Positive comments in relation to "Good Job" etc Nor do i wish for any offensive comments towards me or any Negative comments. I clearly know that this source is a leech and has been so many times, But i'd like to bring back the original spawnscape. Don't make so many changes like another server did which ruined it.
Please refrain yourself from posting negative comments, Thank you.[/b][/center]

item.title: Divergentx (The old Days of ss are back)
item.dc:creator: @panic_veracs panic veracs
item.description:
@panic_veracs wrote:

[center]

[B][SIZE=3][COLOR=#ff0000][U]NOTE[/U][/COLOR]: [/SIZE][COLOR=#000000][SIZE=3]This is a server evolved around bringing back memories of Old Spawnscape! Please Continue to read on to find out more or scroll to the Notice (End Of Thread)
[/SIZE]
[/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR=#000000][CENTER]Divergentx is based around the Spawnscape OLD Source, Not to old. For those who enjoyed the good old days of spawnscape.
Also those who wish to play a 614 Spawn/Eco Server.

A basic run down of what the server has (If you don’t know, This will be short & an non-complex).

  • Fully Functional Player Vs Player system with Drop rewards in safe zones.
  • Multiple PVP zones, Safe, Unsafe and Multi.
  • Old Locations (Magebank, Thieving Pyramid)
  • Donatorzone (Few features added)
  • Player Killing Points Shop
  • Few New Weapons Functioning (Gmaul, Dmace, etc)
  • Player Interface (Displays Kdr, Voting Points, Players online etc)

New Extra’s In Server

  • Custom Chest To Obtain random items
  • Open by obtaining a key

Currently being Added

  • Clan Chat
  • Voting Shop

The server currently has:

  • Auto-Voting (Fully Functional & Incentive Postback)
    Auto-Donation (Same Items)
  • Forum’s Professionally Made
  • Homepage (Professionally Made)
  • Auto-cache downloading Client
  • Fully working Webclient

Divergentx will not have any other major changes unless the community (Majority) votes on a specific thing to add into the server.
If the server’s community would like an extra mini-game, Then it will be added solely for player interaction and entertainment.

[size=14pt]Picture’s of locations and More[/size]

[COLOR=#000000]Original Home Location (Removed Npc’s & Objects)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#000000]Fully Functional Auto-Voting System[/COLOR]
(with original voting rewards)

[COLOR=#000000]Old Thieving Area[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#000000]Player Killing Points Shop (Original)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#000000]
[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#000000]Mage Bank[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#000000]Mage Arena (For Hybrids, Range De-activated in this area)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#000000]Donatorzone (Added Extra Thieving [More Coins])[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#000000]Extra Feature - Key & Chest Area[/COLOR]

[size=18pt][font=impact]Active Divergentx Links[/font][/size]

[B][COLOR=#000000]Homepage [/COLOR][/B]- DivergentX - Innovative RSPS

NOTICE
[b]Please Note, That i do not expect any Positive comments in relation to “Good Job” etc
Nor do i wish for any offensive comments towards me or any Negative comments.
I clearly know that this source is a leech and has been so many times, But i’d like to bring back the original spawnscape.
Don’t make so many changes like another server did which ruined it.

Please refrain yourself from posting negative comments, Thank you.[/b][/center]
